recipes.title: Avocado Chicken Salad
recipes.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a bowl until well combined., Serve on whole grain bread, lettuce wraps, or as a dip.
recipes.ingredients: 1 tbsp Greek yogurt, 1/2 avocado (mashed), 1/2 tsp lemon juice, 1/4 tsp garlic powder, Salt and pepper to taste

recipes.title: Baked Mac & Cheese
recipes.instructions: Melt butter in a pan, stir in flour, then add milk. Whisk until smooth, then add cheese. Mix with cooked pasta and bake at 375°F for 10 minutes. Serve warm.
recipes.ingredients: 1/2 tbsp butter, 1/2 tbsp flour, 1/4 cup milk, 1/4 cup shredded cheese, Salt and pepper to taste

recipes.title: Buffalo Cauliflower Wrap
recipes.instructions: Mix roasted cauliflower with buffalo sauce., Place in tortilla with lettuce and ranch., Roll up and serve.
recipes.ingredients: 1 tbsp buffalo sauce, 1 tbsp ranch dressing, 1 whole wheat tortilla, 1/4 cup shredded lettuce

recipes.title: Caprese Salad
recipes.instructions: Combine tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil in a bowl., Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar., Season with salt and pepper., Toss gently and serve. Cook time: 10 min
recipes.ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil, 1/2 cup fresh mozzarella balls, 1/2 tbsp balsamic vinegar, 5 fresh basil leaves (chopped), Salt and pepper to taste

recipes.title: Cottage Cheese & Berry Bowl
recipes.instructions: Mix cottage cheese, berries, and honey., Top with nuts and serve.
recipes.ingredients: 1 tbsp chopped nuts, 1 tbsp honey, 1/4 cup mixed berries

recipes.title: Garlic Butter Shrimp Pasta
recipes.instructions: Sauté shrimp with butter and garlic. Toss with cooked pasta and Parmesan cheese. Season and serve.
recipes.ingredients: 1 clove garlic (minced), 1 tbsp butter, 1 tbsp Parmesan cheese, 1/2 cup shrimp, Salt and pepper to taste

recipes.title: Ham & Cheese Croissant
recipes.instructions: Slice croissant open. Spread Dijon mustard inside. Add ham and cheese. Serve fresh or toasted.
recipes.ingredients: 1 slice Swiss cheese, 1 tbsp Dijon mustard, 3 slices ham

recipes.title: Hummus & Veggie Pita
recipes.instructions: Spread hummus inside the pita., Stuff with cucumbers, carrots, and spinach., Serve immediately.
recipes.ingredients: 1/4 cup shredded carrots, 1/4 cup sliced cucumbers, 1/4 cup spinach, 2 tbsp hummus

recipes.title: Mason Jar Greek Salad
recipes.instructions: Layer ingredients in a mason jar., Shake before eating., Serve chilled.
recipes.ingredients: 1 tbsp lemon juice, 1 tbsp olive oil, 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, 1/4 cup chickpeas, 1/4 cup feta cheese

recipes.title: Spinach & Cheese Quesadilla
recipes.instructions: Place cheese and spinach on one half of the tortilla., Fold and cook in a pan until golden brown., Slice and serve.
recipes.ingredients: 1/2 cup spinach, 1/4 cup shredded cheese

recipes.title: Tomato & Mozzarella Sandwich
recipes.instructions: Spread pesto on one slice of bread., Add tomatoes and mozzarella., Top with the second slice., Serve fresh or grilled.
recipes.ingredients: 1 tbsp pesto, 1/2 cup sliced tomatoes, 2 slices mozzarella cheese, Salt and pepper to taste

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
recipes.instructions: Toast bread. Mash avocado and spread on toast. Season with salt, pepper, and optional toppings.
recipes.ingredients: 1/2 avocado, Optional: Everything bagel seasoning, red pepper flakes, Salt and pepper to taste

recipes.title: bacon cookies
recipes.instructions: make the things and do it right
recipes.ingredients: bacon,  butter,  rice

recipes.title: Baked Lemon Herb Chicken with Roasted Asparagus
recipes.instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 400°F. 2. Toss asparagus with 1 tbsp olive oil, salt, and pepper. 3. Place chicken in a baking dish, drizzle with remaining olive oil, lemon slices, garlic, herbs, salt, and pepper. 4. Arrange asparagus around chicken. 5. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through.
recipes.ingredients: 1 lb asparagus, 1 tsp dried herbs (thyme, 2 cloves garlic (minced), 2 lemons (sliced), 2 tbsp olive oil, pepper, rosemary), salt

recipes.title: Baked Salmon with Lemon & Dill
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C), place salmon on a baking sheet, drizzle with olive oil, season with salt, pepper, and dill, top with lemon slices, bake for 12-15 minutes until flaky.
recipes.ingredients: 1 lemon (sliced), 1 tbsp olive oil, 1 tsp dried dill, 1 tsp salt, ½ tsp black pepper

recipes.title: Banana Pancakes
recipes.instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Cook on a griddle until golden brown.
recipes.ingredients: 1 tsp cinnamon, 1/2 cup rolled oats, 2 eggs (or flax eggs)

recipes.title: BBQ Chicken Pizza
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C), roll out pizza dough and brush with olive oil, spread BBQ sauce, top with chicken, cheese, and onion, bake for 12-15 minutes until crust is golden.
recipes.ingredients: 1 cup cooked chicken (shredded), 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, 1 tbsp olive oil, ½ cup BBQ sauce, ¼ red onion (sliced)

recipes.title: BBQ Chicken Wrap
recipes.instructions: Mix chicken with BBQ sauce. Place on tortilla with cheese and bell peppers. Roll up and serve.
recipes.ingredients: 1 tbsp BBQ sauce, 1/2 cup cooked chicken (shredded), 1/4 cup chopped bell peppers, 1/4 cup shredded cheese

recipes.title: BBQ Pulled Pork Sandwich
recipes.instructions: Mix pulled pork with BBQ sauce, Place on bun and top with coleslaw, Serve warm
recipes.ingredients: 1 burger bun, 1 tbsp BBQ sauce, 1 tbsp coleslaw

recipes.title: Beef Tacos
recipes.instructions: Cook ground beef in a skillet until browned, add taco seasoning and water then simmer for 5 minutes, warm tortillas and fill with beef, top with lettuce, cheese, tomatoes, and sour cream.
recipes.ingredients: 1 cup shredded lettuce, 1 packet taco seasoning, ½ cup diced tomatoes, ½ cup shredded cheese, ½ cup water, ¼ cup sour cream, 8 small tortillas

recipes.title: Breakfast Burrito
recipes.instructions: Place eggs, bacon, cheese, and salsa in tortilla, Roll up and serve
recipes.ingredients: 1 tbsp salsa, 1 tbsp shredded cheese, 2 scrambled eggs, 2 slices cooked bacon

recipes.title: Breakfast Quesadilla
recipes.instructions: Scramble eggs. Sauté vegetables. Place eggs, cheese, and vegetables on a tortilla. Fold in half and cook in a skillet until cheese is melted.
recipes.ingredients: 1 tortilla, 1/4 cup cooked vegetables (peppers, 1/4 cup shredded cheese, onions)

recipes.title: Breakfast Sandwich
recipes.instructions: Cook egg. Toast English muffin. Assemble sandwich with egg, cheese, and ham/bacon.
recipes.ingredients: 1 English muffin, 1 slice cheese, 1 slice ham or bacon

recipes.title: Breakfast Sandwiches
recipes.instructions: Toast English muffin, Layer egg, cheese, and ham, Serve warm
recipes.ingredients: 1 scrambled egg, 1 slice cheese, 1 slice ham or turkey

recipes.title: Carmel Popcorn
recipes.instructions:
Pop a large bowl full of popcorn.
Combine all other ingredients in a small pot.
Melt everything together at medium heat.
Stir until you get a nice caramelized texture.
Pour caramel onto popcorn and stir with a wooden spoon.
recipes.ingredients: brown sugar,  butter,  marshmallows,  peanut butter,  vanilla

recipes.title: Cheesy Baked Ziti
recipes.instructions: Mix pasta with marinara sauce, Top with mozzarella and Parmesan, Bake at 375°F for 10 minutes, Serve warm.
recipes.ingredients: 1 tbsp Parmesan cheese, 1/4 cup marinara sauce, 1/4 cup shredded mozzarella cheese

recipes.title: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
recipes.instructions: Toss pasta with chicken and Alfredo sauce, Sprinkle with Parmesan and serve
recipes.ingredients: 1 tbsp Parmesan cheese, 1/2 cup cooked chicken (diced), 1/4 cup Alfredo sauce

recipes.title: Chicken and Sweet Potato Bowls
recipes.instructions: 1. Roast sweet potatoes (400°F for 30-40 minutes). 2. Combine chicken, sweet potatoes, black beans, and corn. 3. Top with salsa, avocado, and lime juice.
recipes.ingredients: 1 can black beans (rinsed), 1/2 cup corn, 1/4 cup salsa, 2 sweet potatoes (roasted, cubed), lime juice, optional: avocado

recipes.title: Chickpea and Vegetable Curry (Mild)
recipes.instructions: 1. Sauté onion and garlic. 2. Add curry powder and cook for 1 minute. 3. Add chickpeas, tomatoes, mixed vegetables, and coconut milk. 4. Simmer for 15-20 minutes. 5. Season with salt and pepper. 6. Serve with rice or quinoa.
recipes.ingredients: 1 can coconut milk, 1 can diced tomatoes, 1 cup mixed vegetables (carrots, 1 onion (diced), 1 tbsp curry powder, 2 cloves garlic (minced), green beans), optional: cooked rice or quinoa., peas, pepper, salt

recipes.title: Chickpea Avocado Toast
recipes.instructions: Mash avocado with chickpeas, lemon juice, salt, and pepper, Spread on toast and serve
recipes.ingredients: 1/2 avocado, 1/2 tsp lemon juice, 1/4 cup mashed chickpeas, Salt and pepper to taste

recipes.title: Cow's Milk
recipes.instructions: Go to farm, grab a cow, do things to it, store milk in fridge for yummy snack
recipes.ingredients: Bucket, Gloves

recipes.title: Creamy Tomato Basil Soup
recipes.instructions: Heat a pot over medium heat, sauté onions and garlic until soft, add tomatoes, chicken broth, salt, pepper, and basil, simmer for 15 minutes, blend until smooth, stir in heavy cream and serve.
recipes.ingredients: 1 cup heavy cream, 1 small onion (diced), 1 tsp basil, 1 tsp salt, ½ tsp pepper, 2 cups chicken broth, 3 cloves garlic (minced)

recipes.title: Egg & Avacado Toast
recipes.instructions: 'Spread mashed avocado on toast.', 'Top with sliced egg, salt, and pepper.', 'Serve immediately.'
recipes.ingredients: '1 boiled egg (sliced)', '1/2 avocado (mashed)', 'Salt and pepper to taste'

recipes.title: Egg Salad Lettuce Cups
recipes.instructions: 1. Chop hard-boiled eggs. 2. Mix eggs with mayonnaise, celery, mustard, salt, and pepper. 3. Spoon egg salad into lettuce leaves.
recipes.ingredients: 1 tbsp mustard, 1/4 cup mayonnaise (gluten-free), 2 tbsp celery (diced), lettuce leaves, pepper, salt

recipes.title: Egg Salad Lettuce Wraps
recipes.instructions: Mix eggs, Greek yogurt, mustard, paprika, salt, and pepper in a bowl, Scoop onto lettuce leaves and roll up, Serve chilled
recipes.ingredients: 1 tbsp Greek yogurt, 1/2 tsp mustard, 1/4 tsp paprika, Lettuce leaves, Salt and pepper to taste

recipes.title: eggs with spinach
recipes.instructions: make the eggs and add spinach while cooking
recipes.ingredients: Salt, Spinach

recipes.title: French Toast
recipes.instructions: Whisk together eggs, milk, vanilla, and cinnamon. Dip bread slices in the mixture. Melt butter in a skillet and cook bread until golden brown on both sides.
recipes.ingredients: 1 tbsp butter, 1 tsp vanilla extract, 1/4 cup milk, 1/4 tsp cinnamon, 4 slices bread

recipes.title: Gluten-Free Avocado Toast
recipes.instructions: 'Toast the gluten-free bread.', 'Mash the avocado in a bowl and mix with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.', 'Spread the avocado mixture on the toasted bread.', 'Add any optional toppings you like.'
recipes.ingredients: '1 ripe avocado', '1/2 lemon, 'Optional toppings: cherry tomatoes, 'Salt and pepper to taste', juiced', or a poached egg', red pepper flakes

recipes.title: Gluten-Free Banana Pancakes
recipes.instructions: 'Mash the banana in a bowl.', 'Add eggs, baking powder, vanilla extract, and cinnamon. Mix well.', 'Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat.', 'Pour small amounts of batter to form pancakes. Cook for 2-3 minutes on each side.', 'Serve with your favorite toppings.'
recipes.ingredients: '1/2 tsp gluten-free baking powder', '1/2 tsp vanilla extract', '1/4 tsp cinnamon (optional)', '2 eggs'

recipes.title: Gluten-Free Breakfast Burrito
recipes.instructions: 'Scramble the eggs in a pan over medium heat.', 'Warm the tortillas in a pan or microwave.', 'Fill each tortilla with scrambled eggs, black beans, cheese, salsa, and avocado slices.', 'Roll up the tortillas and enjoy!'
recipes.ingredients: '1/4 avocado, '1/4 cup black beans, '1/4 cup salsa', '1/4 cup shredded cheese (optional)', '2 eggs', 'Salt and pepper to taste', drained and rinsed', sliced'

recipes.title: Gluten-Free Breakfast Sandwich
recipes.instructions: 'Toast the gluten-free bread.', 'Cook the egg in a pan to your preferred style (fried, scrambled, etc.).', 'Assemble the sandwich with the egg, cheese, and ham or turkey between the toasted bread slices.', 'Heat the sandwich in the pan with butter or olive oil until the cheese melts (if using).'
recipes.ingredients: '1 egg', '1 slice of cheese (optional)', '1 slice of ham or turkey (optional)', '1 tbsp butter or olive oil'

recipes.title: Gluten-Free Chia Pudding
recipes.instructions: 'In a bowl, mix chia seeds, almond milk, honey, and vanilla extract.', 'Let it sit for at least 15 minutes, stirring occasionally, until it thickens.', 'Top with fresh fruit, nuts, or granola before serving.'
recipes.ingredients: '1 cup almond milk', '1 tbsp honey or maple syrup', '1/2 tsp vanilla extract', 'Toppings: fresh fruit, nuts, or granola (gluten-free)'

recipes.title: Gluten-Free Oatmeal
recipes.instructions: 'In a pot, bring water or milk to a boil.', 'Add the oats and reduce heat to a simmer. Cook for 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally.', 'Stir in honey or maple syrup and cinnamon.', 'Top with fresh fruit, nuts, or seeds before serving.'
recipes.ingredients: '1 cup water or milk (dairy or non-dairy)', '1 tbsp honey or maple syrup', '1/2 tsp cinnamon', 'Toppings: fresh fruit, nuts, or seeds'

recipes.title: Gluten-Free Omelette
recipes.instructions: 'Beat the eggs in a bowl and season with salt and pepper.', 'Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and add the bell peppers and tomatoes. Cook for 2-3 minutes.', 'Pour the beaten eggs into the pan and cook until the edges start to set.', 'Add the cheese (if using) and fold the omelette in half. Cook for another 2-3 minutes.', 'Serve hot.'
recipes.ingredients: '1/4 cup diced bell peppers', '1/4 cup diced tomatoes', '1/4 cup shredded cheese (optional)', 'Salt and pepper to taste'

recipes.title: Gluten-Free Smoothie Bowl
recipes.instructions: 'Blend the frozen berries, banana, yogurt, and almond milk until smooth.', 'Pour into a bowl and add your favorite toppings.'
recipes.ingredients: '1 banana', '1/2 cup almond milk', '1/2 cup gluten-free yogurt', 'Toppings: granola (gluten-free), chia seeds, sliced fruit'

recipes.title: Gluten-Free Yogurt Parfait
recipes.instructions: 'Layer the yogurt, granola, and berries in a glass or bowl.', 'Drizzle with honey if desired.', 'Enjoy immediately.'
recipes.ingredients: '1 tbsp honey (optional)', '1/2 cup gluten-free granola', '1/2 cup mixed berries'

recipes.title: greasy cookies
recipes.instructions: mix flour and sugar and put grease on top
recipes.ingredients: grease, sugar

recipes.title: Greek Yogurt Chicken Salad
recipes.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a bowl, Serve on toast, lettuce wraps, or as a dip
recipes.ingredients: 1 tbsp chopped almonds, 1 tbsp chopped celery, 1 tbsp lemon juice, 1/4 cup Greek yogurt, Salt and pepper to taste

recipes.title: Ground Turkey and Bell Pepper Skillet
recipes.instructions: 1. Brown ground turkey. 2. Add onion, garlic, and bell peppers, cook until softened. 3. Add diced tomatoes, chili powder, cumin, salt, and pepper. 4. Simmer for 15 minutes.
recipes.ingredients: 1 can diced tomatoes, 1 onion (sliced), 1 tsp chili powder, 1 tsp cumin, 2 bell peppers (sliced), 2 cloves garlic (minced), pepper, salt

recipes.title: Honey Garlic Shrimp & Rice
recipes.instructions: Mix honey, soy sauce, garlic, and ginger then marinate shrimp for 15 minutes, heat oil in a pan and cook shrimp for 2-3 minutes per side, pour marinade into the pan and simmer for 1 minute, serve over rice and garnish with green onions.
recipes.ingredients: 1 green onion (chopped), 1 tbsp olive oil, 1 tsp ginger (grated), 2 cups cooked rice, 2 tbsp soy sauce, 3 cloves garlic (minced), 3 tbsp honey

recipes.title: Meatball Sub
recipes.instructions: Place meatballs in roll, Top with marinara and cheese, Bake until cheese is melted, Serve warm
recipes.ingredients: 1 slice provolone cheese, 1/4 cup marinara sauce, 3 cooked meatballs

recipes.title: meatloaf
recipes.instructions: Put the meat in a loaf
recipes.ingredients: loaf

recipes.title: Mediterranean Hummus Wrap
recipes.instructions: Spread hummus on the tortilla., Add cucumber, tomatoes, feta cheese, and lettuce., Roll up tightly and slice in half., Serve immediately.
recipes.ingredients: 1/4 cup chopped cucumber, 1/4 cup diced tomatoes, 1/4 cup shredded lettuce, 2 tbsp feta cheese, 2 tbsp hummus

recipes.title: Pancake
recipes.instructions: Mix all ingredients, pour into pan, flip when ready, place delicately on to plate.
recipes.ingredients: Chocolate Chips, Egg, Milk, Syrup

recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.instructions: 1. Mix flour, eggs, milk. 2. Cook on a griddle. 3. Serve with syrup.
recipes.ingredients: Eggs, Flour, Milk

recipes.title: Quinoa Salad with Roasted Vegetables
recipes.instructions: 1. Roast vegetables (400°F for 20-25 minutes). 2. Combine quinoa, vegetables, chickpeas. 3. Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, salt, pepper, herbs. 4. Drizzle dressing over salad and mix.
recipes.ingredients: 1 cup roasted vegetables (broccoli, 1/2 cup chickpeas, 1/4 cup olive oil, 2 tbsp lemon juice, bell peppers), carrots, cilantro), herbs (parsley, pepper, salt

recipes.title: Salmon Salad with Lemon Vinaigrette
recipes.instructions: 1. Drain salmon. 2. Combine salmon, cucumber, red onion, and dill. 3. Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. 4. Drizzle vinaigrette over salmon salad. 5. Serve in lettuce leaves.
recipes.ingredients: 1 tbsp lemon juice, 1/2 cucumber (diced), 1/4 cup dill (chopped), 1/4 red onion (diced), 2 tbsp olive oil, lettuce leaves., pepper, salt

recipes.title: Sausage and Peppers Sandwich
recipes.instructions: Place sausage in roll, Top with sautéed peppers, onions, and marinara sauce, Serve warm
recipes.ingredients: 1 small sub roll, 1 tbsp marinara sauce, 1/4 cup sautéed bell peppers and onions

recipes.title: Shrimp Scampi with Zucchini Noodles
recipes.instructions: 1. Heat olive oil in a skillet. 2. Add garlic and cook for 1 minute. 3. Add shrimp and cook until pink. 4. Add zucchini noodles, lemon juice, parsley, salt, and pepper. 5. Cook until zucchini is tender-crisp.
recipes.ingredients: 1/4 cup lemon juice, 1/4 cup parsley (chopped), 2 tbsp olive oil, 4 cloves garlic (minced), 4 zucchini (spiralized), deveined), pepper, salt

recipes.title: Simple Chicken Salad
recipes.instructions: 1. Shred cooked chicken. 2. Combine chicken, mayonnaise, celery, onion, mustard, salt, and pepper. 3. Serve in lettuce leaves or with gluten-free crackers.
recipes.ingredients: 1 tbsp onion (diced), 1 tsp mustard, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, 2 tbsp celery (diced), lettuce leaves or gluten-free crackers., pepper, salt

recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti and reserve ½ cup pasta water, cook pancetta in olive oil until crispy then add garlic, whisk eggs with Parmesan cheese in a bowl, toss spaghetti into the pan then remove from heat and mix in egg mixture, stir quickly adding pasta water gradually for a creamy sauce.
recipes.ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil, ½ cup grated Parmesan cheese, 2 cloves garlic (minced), 2 eggs, 4 oz pancetta or bacon (diced), salt and pepper to taste

recipes.title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C), cook ground beef until browned then mix with rice, tomato sauce, salt, pepper, and Italian seasoning, stuff bell peppers with mixture, bake for 25 minutes, sprinkle cheese on top and bake for another 5 minutes.
recipes.ingredients: 1 cup cooked rice, 1 cup tomato sauce, 1 lb ground beef, 1 tsp Italian seasoning, 1 tsp salt, ½ cup shredded cheese, ½ tsp black pepper

recipes.title: Teriyaki Chicken & Vegetables
recipes.instructions: Heat oil in a pan, cook chicken until golden, add vegetables and stir-fry for 5 minutes, pour in teriyaki sauce and simmer for 2 minutes, serve over rice.
recipes.ingredients: 1 cup cooked rice, 1 tbsp olive oil, ½ cup teriyaki sauce, 2 cups mixed vegetables

recipes.title: Teriyaki Chicken Rice Bowl
recipes.instructions: Mix chicken with teriyaki sauce, Serve over rice with broccoli on top
recipes.ingredients: 1 tbsp teriyaki sauce, 1/2 cup cooked chicken (diced), 1/4 cup steamed broccoli

recipes.title: Tofu Scramble
recipes.instructions: Cook onion and bell pepper until tender. Add tofu and spices. Cook until heated through.
recipes.ingredients: 1 diced bell pepper, 1 diced onion, 1 tsp nutritional yeast, 1 tsp turmeric, Salt & pepper to taste

recipes.title: Tuna Melt
recipes.instructions: 'Mix tuna with mayonnaise.', 'Spread on bread and top with cheese.', 'Broil in oven until cheese melts.', 'Serve warm.'
recipes.ingredients: '1 slice cheese', '1 tbsp mayonnaise', '1/2 can tuna'

recipes.title: Tuna Salad with Apple and Celery
recipes.instructions: 1. Drain tuna. 2. Combine tuna, apple, celery, mayonnaise, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. 3. Serve in lettuce leaves or with gluten-free crackers.
recipes.ingredients: 1 apple (diced), 1 tbsp lemon juice, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, 2 celery stalks (diced), drained), lettuce leaves or crackers., pepper, salt

recipes.title: Turkey and Avocado Lettuce Wraps
recipes.instructions: 1. Wash and separate lettuce leaves. 2. Fill lettuce leaves with turkey, avocado, cucumber, and red onion. 3. Add mustard or mayo if desired.
recipes.ingredients: 1 avocado (sliced), 1 head lettuce (large leaves), 1/2 cucumber (sliced), 1/4 cup red onion (thinly sliced), optional: mustard or mayo

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.instructions: Cook garlic in sesame oil. Add vegetables and stir-fry until tender-crisp. Add soy sauce and cook for another minute. Serve over rice or quinoa.
recipes.ingredients: 1 cup sliced bell peppers, 1 cup sliced carrots, 1 tbsp sesame oil, 1/2 cup snap peas, 2 cloves garlic (minced), 2 tbsp soy sauce (or tamari)

recipes.title: Yogurt Parfait
recipes.instructions: Layer yogurt, granola, and fruit in a glass or bowl.
recipes.ingredients: 1/2 cup granola, 1/4 cup sliced fruit (berries, bananas, etc.)

recipes.title: Zucchini Noodles with Pesto
recipes.instructions: Sauté zucchini noodles in a pan for 2 minutes, Toss with pesto and Parmesan cheese, Serve immediately
recipes.ingredients: 1 tbsp Parmesan cheese, 2 tbsp pesto, Salt and pepper to taste
